code: import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Routes,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import ShowTodoList from"./components/showTodoList";import CreateTodo from"./components/createTodo";import UpdateTodo from"./components/updateTodo";import"./App.scss";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/todos")).then(res=>{console.log("Tareas recibidas en App.js:",res.data);setTodos(Array.isArray(res.data)?res.data:[]);}).catch(err=>{console.error("Error al cargar tareas:",err.message);});},[]);const handleAddTodo=newTodo=>{axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/todos"),newTodo).then(res=>{console.log("Nueva tarea agregada:",res.data);fetchTodos();}).catch(err=>{console.error("Error al crear la tarea:",err.message);});};const fetchTodos=()=>{axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/todos")).then(res=>{console.log("Lista de tareas actualizada:",res.data);setTodos(res.data);}).catch(err=>{console.error("Error al cargar tareas:",err.message);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Crear Tarea"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/show",children:"Ver Lista de Tareas"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateTodo,{handleAddTodo:handleAddTodo})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/show",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShowTodoList,{todos:todos})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/update/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UpdateTodo,{})})]})]});}export default App;
